marketdetails.Products: Baked goods; Cheese and/or dairy products; Crafts and/or woodworking items; Eggs; Fresh fruit and vegetables; Fresh and/or dried herbs; Honey; Canned or preserved fruits, vegetables, jams, jellies, preserves, salsas, pickles, dried fruit, etc.; Meat; Plants in containers; Poultry; Prepared foods (for immediate consumption); Soap and/or body care products
